Male-fullbody-loss_weight-Gym.Warm-Up: 5-10 minutes of light cardio on a stationary bike or treadmill
Workout: Barbell Squats - 3 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Lunges - 3 sets of 12 reps
Barbell Bench Press - 3 sets of 12 reps
Seated Cable Rows - 3 sets of 12 reps
Lat Pulldowns - 3 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Shoulder Press - 3 sets of 12 reps
Planks - 3 sets, holding for 30-60 seconds each
Crunches - 3 sets of 12 reps
Cool Down: 5-10 minutes of light cardio on a stationary bike or treadmill
Stretching of all major muscle groups

Male-fullbody-loss_weight-Home.Warm-Up: 5-10 minutes of light cardio (such as jumping jacks, jogging in place, or high knees
Workout: Bodyweight Squats - 3 sets of 12 reps
Lunges - 3 sets of 12 reps
Push-Ups - 3 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Rows (using water bottles or other household objects as weights) - 3 sets of 12 reps per arm
Dumbbell Shoulder Press (using water bottles or other household objects as weights) - 3 sets of 12 reps
Plank - 3 sets, holding for 30-60 seconds each
Bicycle Crunches - 3 sets of 12 reps per side
Cool Down: 5-10 minutes of light cardio (such as jumping jacks, jogging in place, or high knees)
Stretching of all major muscle groups
